greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: Product_{n>=1} (1 - Lucas(n)*x^n + (-1)^n*x^(2*n))^3 where Lucas(n) = A000204(n).
comment: a(A020757(n)) = 0 where A020757 lists numbers that are not the sum of two triangular numbers.
link: Paul D. Hanna, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: G.f.: exp( Sum_{n>=1} -3 * sigma(n) * A000204(n) * x^n/n ).
example: which are numbers that are not the sum of two triangular numbers.
program: (PARI) /* Subroutine used in PARI programs below: */
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jan 07 2012
